channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 17:34 Drive the threat of use of the Cabinet of Construction by further messages.
item.description: 🟢 17:34 Drive the threat of use of the Cabinet of Construction by further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
